column5: Driving to work all last week in the early am I have noticed a lot of bass boats going south bound! HMMMM! Then on thursday I seen a bis a$$ ford embedded with the "Fishing the Flats" logo all over it! Hmmm! Is Henry back? or is he on his way back to the flats, and everyone else chasing him? So far all the same boats and vehicles heading east and sort of south! Is there a tourney going on?Close by! Enlighten me!
As far as I know he still spends time in Canada. In fact my brother in law did some work on his boat this summer.
